remarks: Deduce the identity element of a magma from its properties. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
statement:
grpidd.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` G ) ) $.
grpidd.p $e |- ( ph -> .+ = ( +g ` G ) ) $.
grpidd.z $e |- ( ph -> .0. e. B ) $.
grpidd.i $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( .0. .+ x ) = x ) $.
grpidd.j $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( x .+ .0. ) = x ) $.
grpidd $p |- ( ph -> .0. = ( 0g ` G ) ) $.
$d .0. x $.
$d G x $.
$d ph x $.
